original: Lindh, Bengt Ragnar, apotekare, Trollhättan, f. 26/5/82 i Karlstad av Nils Fredrik L. o. Anna Maria Jansson. G. 1. 09 m. Alfhild Dagmar Maria Lundqvist; 2. 27 m. farm. kand. Gunborg Vilhelmina Margareta Svanberg. Barn: Astrid f. 11, g. m. ing. Harry Bergquist, Bengt Åke 12, Lars Ragnar 29, Per Anders 34. — Mogiex. i Karlstad 02, farm. kand. 06, apot:ex. 15. Elev v. apot. Kronan o. Lejonet i Gbg 02-05, anst. v. Lejonet i Gbg, Leoparden i Sthlm 07-09, Lejonet i Sthlm 09-13, Seraf :las. i Sthlm 15-33 (förest.), priv. å apot. i Fjäll-backa 33, transp. t. apot. i Trollhättan 40.
translated:
Lindh, Bengt Ragnar, pharmacist, Trollhättan, born on May 26, 1882 in Karlstad to Nils Fredrik L. and Anna Maria Jansson. Married:

1. In 1909 to Alfhild Dagmar Maria Lundqvist.
2. In 1927 to Gunborg Vilhelmina Margareta Svanberg, who holds a degree in pharmacy.

Children: 
- Astrid, born in 1911, married to engineer Harry Bergquist.
- Bengt Åke, born in 1912.
- Lars Ragnar, born in 1929.
- Per Anders, born in 1934.

Education and career:
- Graduated from Karlstad School of Pharmacy in 1902.
- Bachelor of Pharmacy in 1906.
- Licensed pharmacist in 1915.
- Apprenticeship at Kronan and Lejonet pharmacies in Gothenburg from 1902-1905.
- Employment at Lejonet in Gothenburg and Leoparden in Stockholm from 1907-1909.
- Employment at Lejonet in Stockholm from 1909-1913.
- Chief pharmacist at Seraf:las in Stockholm from 1915-1933.
- Private pharmacist at a pharmacy in Fjällbacka in 1933.
- Transferred to a pharmacy in Trollhättan in 1940.
